miniGames.blockd

Class MyMouseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • miniGames.blockd.MyMouseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener

    public class MyMouseAdapter
extends MouseAdapter
    This class receives mouse events and is most important class in this Minigame
    Author:
    Andrzej Tarnowski

    • Method Detail

      • CheckEnd

        private void CheckEnd(int i)
        Method searches through panels is any panel is neighbor with panel with the same color(other than white). If such panel isn't found method counts how many panels with color other than white left and assign this to field panelcount. After that, method set a degree depending on panelcount. Than creates a Dialog with information to the player what degree player gets.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of Component from Frame

      • Disappear

        private void Disappear(String Name,
             String parentp,
             int Neigh)
        Method checks is any neighbor(other than parent) of target panel has the same color as that panel. If such neighbor exists Neigh is increased and method elicit itself by recursion where current panel becomes parent panel and neighbor becomes current panel. If the only neighbor with the same color is parent or such neighbor doesn't exits than method changes current panel's color to white if Neigh is bigger than 0 and current recursion ends and method go back to earlier recursion
        Parameters:
        Name - Name of current panel
        parentp - Name of parent panel
        Neigh - variable which contains information is current panel has any neighbors with the same color as itself(when method is elicited that parameter is always 0)

      • Gravity

        private void Gravity(int col)
        Method contains algorithm of falling panels: Searches first bottom white panel,then counts how many white panels are in row. Then sets color of bottom white panel to the color of first panel higher on last white panel in row then sets color of panel which is on earlier white panel to the color which is on the first panel higher on last white panel in row.
        Parameters:
        col - index of column

      • RemoveEmptyColumns

        private void RemoveEmptyColumns()
        This method removes column where each panel is white and set each color of panel from columns with index modulo 10 bigger or equeal than removed column to color of panel with the current index+1 and sets color of each panel from column 9 to white

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e)
        Method activates Disappear(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int) for clicked panel then activates Gravity(int) for columns where panels disappeared than activate RemoveEmptyColumns() and CheckEnd(int)
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseClicked in class MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
